title: The Unfiltered Blog
description: Welcome to The Unfiltered Blog, a place for me to share my thoughts on anything that takes my interest.

items.title: The Stick 2, Electric Boogaloo: A Review of My New Cane
items.content_html:
The Stick 2, Electric Boogaloo: A Review of My New Cane

I recently purchased a brand-new cane, and was asked to share my experience with it so far...

items.title: HackUPC 2025 Part 1: The Tourist
items.content_html:
HackUPC 2025 Part 1: The Tourist

A plastic cow, a bitcoin ATM(?), and a driverless train.

items.title: HackUPC 2025 Part 2: The Hacker
items.content_html:
HackUPC 2025 Part 2: The Hacker

HackUPC is Europe's largest hackathon, held at the Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya in Barcelona, Spain. This year, I was invited to attend with some of my friends from university.

items.title: Welcome to The Unfiltered Blog!
items.content_html:
Welcome to The Unfiltered Blog!

Hello all! This is my blog, where I talk about random stuff that I find interesting. Topics may (or may not) include:

  • Tech
  • Games
  • TTRPGs
  • Tutorials
  • Literally anything else I can use to procrastinate
